archimate:Requirement.name: Data Retention and Archiving policy
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Data Retention and Archiving policy to govern the retention of data for future use or reference, to archive data such that it can be searched and accessed at a later date, and to dispose of data that is no longer needed, while ensuring adherence to the applicable laws and regulations. Should incorporate guidelines on how long data is to be kept in primary and secondary storage locations prior to its secure deletion.
